She has a dream of completing her rental houses although she is faced with a lack of enough capital. Harriet will use the loan to complete her rental houses by buying bricks and paying for labor..

loans.use: to complete her rental houses by buying bricks and paying for labor.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Silvina to improve her business. She has a meat jerky business, where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some seasonings such as salt, soy sauce and pepper powder. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2007. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

Running a business has made Silvina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy meat jerky seasoning, such as salt, soy sauce, pepper powder and other items.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
As a married parent of ten children, Vilma works hard to support her family.

She has an ambulant fruit-vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raisings pigs. Vilma is borrowing 12,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) through NWTF to purchase additional fruits to sell.

Vilma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fruits to sell.

loans.name: Nelson De Jesús

texts.es:
Nelson de 36 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador, ama su familia y asegura que su negocio es su única fuente de ingresos con la cual sostiene a su familia.
Se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en una pequeña legumbrería desde hace algunos años. Sueña con mejorar su condición económica y expandir su negocio. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito  que invertirá en la compra de surtido con el fin de incrementar sus ventas y posicionarse en el mercado local.
texts.en:
Nelson is 36 years old and is a hardworking man.  He loves his family and tells us that his business is his only source of income with which to support his family.

He sells fruits and vegetables in a small shop and has done so for several years.  He hopes to improve his financial condition and expand his business.  He is asking for a loan so he can buy products so he can increase his sales and set up in the local market.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Silvia Inés

texts.es:
Silvia de 49 años de edad, es una mujer entregada a su familia y hogar. Desde hace algunos años se dedica a la talabartería como actividad económica, debido a que el dinero que devenga su esposo no es suficiente para el sostenimiento familiar. Con el fin de cumplir con la producción solicitada, se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá la compra de cuero e insumos (pegantes, hebillas)
Sueña con tener una gran empresa y convertirse en una fuente de empleo para las personas más vulnerables de su comunidad.
texts.en: Silvia is 49 years old, and she is a woman dedicated to her family and household. For many years, she has worked at a leather goods shop because the money her husband earns is not sufficient for the family's sustenance. With the goal of completing requested orders, she is requesting a loan that she will invest in the purchase of leather and supplies (glue, buckles). She dreams of having a big business and of making it a source of work for the most vulnerable people in her community.

loans.use: to buy leather and supplies (glue, buckles).

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine is 41 years old and lives with her husband and parents close to Kapan city. Narine graduated from Kapan State Medical College and for more than 10 years has worked as a nurse in Kapan hospital. Narine with her husband is also engaged in an agricultural business. Narine has a lot of chickens and a plot of land where she grows vegetables and fruits. Narine and her husband sell their products in Kapan  markets. Narine is very happy that she is a nurse in the hospital and does her work with pleasure but, at the same time, the salary is too low. That’s why she engaged in the agricultural business which is more profitable and allows her to support her family. 
Narine needs a loan of 600.000 Armenian drams to buy 30 young chickens and seedlings for her garden. She is counting on support from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy 30 young chickens and seedlings for her garden

loans.name: Yusta

texts.en: Yusta is a 50-year-old hardworking widow with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She mainly does outside catering, selling food on a large scale to parties, and farms as a side income to enhance her standard of living. She is faced with the challenge of people who owe her money and affect her business. Her dream is to construct a house and start up a hotel. Yusta intends to use the loan to pay school fees for her children

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a 39-year-old married woman with three children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has been running a retail shop since 2009 and has been able to pay school fees for her children. She has a dream of creating a bigger business to increase her income base. High competition and rainy seasons are her major challenges. Agnes will use the loan to add stock such as soap and cooking oil to sell.

loans.use: to add stock such as soap and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: San Miguel Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  San Miguel está en su 1° ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 10 integrantes están por debajo  de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos. Ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas y a ayudarse las unas a las otras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.  Dora, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con ingresos muy bajos, ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total, ya que con ello podrá dar un mejor bienestar a su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace es la venta de productos agrícolas. También cabe destacar que las señoras del grupo en su mayoría son analfabetas y que ahora están retomando sus estudios.
La Sra.  Dora Solicita  este crédito para la compra  insumos agrícolas  lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group named San Miguel is on their first loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. They are doing the elimination of poverty survey. Ten members are below the poverty line with very low incomes. They are learning to work together and help each other. 

One of the members is Dora, who in her last survey showed a poverty level within level one (red), that is, with a very low income. Through continuous effort and work her situation is improving, but she is also aware that the work and effort she is putting in must be continuous and permanent if she is to achieve total success and be able to give her family better well-being. Selling farm products is one of the jobs she does. It is also fitting to point out that the majority of the women in the group are illiterate and are now retaking their studies.

Dora is requesting this loan so she can purchase farm supplies, which will help her to settle her business plan and improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies to sell

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comité  Kuña Kyrey, se conformó con la iniciativa de la una de las miembros. Actualmente se encuentran en el 2do ciclo, con 13 integrantes, todas trabajaran y se ayudaran para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde ocho  se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien por medio de la venta de panificados está saliendo adelante. Cuenta que se hizo de muy buena clientela que siempre compra de ella sus panificados frescos y por medio de eso tiene los ingresos que necesita para cubrir las necesidades del día a día. Su sueño es poder tener una buena panadería donde poder seguir con su producción y también poder ayudar a otras personas dándoles trabajo.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra harina, huevo, sal, levadura y demás, para poder seguir creciendo e invirtiendo en su plan de negocios.
texts.en:
The committee Kuña Kyrey formed due to the initiative of one of its members. Currently they are on their second loan cycle with thirteen members. They will all work and help each other to get ahead. They are doing the elimination of poverty survey. Eight of them are below the poverty line with very low incomes.

One of the members is Maria, who is getting ahead by selling baked goods. She says she has built up a very good clientele who always buy her freshly baked goods from her, thereby giving her the income she needs to cover day to day necessities. Her dream is to be able to have a good bakery where she can continue with her production and also be able to help other people by giving them work.

She is requesting this loan so she can purchase flour, eggs, salt, yeast, and other items in order to be able to continue growing and investing in her business plan.

loans.use: to purchase flour, eggs, salt, yeast, and other items

loans.name: Sebastián

texts.es:
Sebastían es un joven de 22 años de edad. Acaba de terminar de prestar el servicio obligatorio en la marina y desea capacitarse con el fin de adquirir conocimientos en el área de lácteos,  e iniciar con su proyecto de negocio a fin de ayudarles a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. Razón que lo ha impulsado a solicitar un crédito ya que no cuenta con los recursos para realizar dicha inversión.
Asegura que con esta capacitación tendrá los conocimientos para la producción de diferentes tipos de quesos, lo que le permitirá incursionar en este sector y mejorar las condiciones económicas en su hogar.
texts.en: Sebastián is a 22-year-old young man. He has just finished his obligatory service in the navy and wishes to train with the goal of acquiring knowledge of the dairy industry and beginning his business project so he can help his parents with the household expenses. This has inspired him to request a loan since he does not have the resources to make said investment. He is confident that from this training he will get the knowledge he needs to be able to produce different types of cheese, which will allow him to enter the dairy sector and improve his family’s economic conditions.

loans.use: to train in dairy production

loans.name: Raúl

texts.es:
Raúl vive en casa propia en la meseta de Achumani en la ciudad de La Paz, trabaja en uno de los hospitales de la ciudad de La Paz,  en el área de emergencia. Raúl es de profesión traumatólogo, con esta actividad el mantiene a su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para pagar la construcción de una vivienda en Coroico, para la cual necesita bastante material ya que como queda lejos de La ciudad, el material comprado anteriormente ya no sirve debido a que no fue guardado y el clima caliente y la humedad lo destrozaron.

El sueño de Raúl es poder jubilarse del hospital y hacer que su vivienda de Coroico se convierta en un hotel y poder vivir de los ingresos del mismo.
texts.en:
Raúl lives in his own house in the Achumani plateau in the city of La Paz.  He works in the emergency room of one of the city's hospitals.  Raúl is a traumatologist and, with this work, he is able to support his family.

Raúl is applying for a loan to pay for work on a building in Coroico.  For this work, he needs quite a lot of material.  With Coroico being quite far from the city, the material that Raúl bought before is now ruined as it was in storage and destroyed by the humidity and warm climate.

Raúl's dream is to be able to retire from the hospital and to convert his home in Coroico into a hotel and then live off the earnings from it.

loans.use: to buy material for a building in Coroico, where he is thinking of retiring.  He will convert the building into a hotel.

loans.name: Carmen Cenovia

texts.es:
Carmen a sus 63 años de edad, es una mujer llena de vida y con un proyecto claro por cumplir. Debido a su precaria condición económica, ha tenido que a travesar por muchas dificultades y laborar como empleada doméstica en varias casas de familia. En la actualidad se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas desde su vivienda, actividad que alterna con la venta de productos por catálogo, con el fin de generar los recursos para el sostenimiento de su familia.
Se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para la preparación de alimentos. Espera que con dicha inversión pueda mejorar su condición económica y su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen, at 63 years old, is full of life and with projects that she wants to put into action.  Given her difficult financial situation, Carmen has had to deal with many difficulties and work as a domestic servant for various families.  She currently makes a living selling fast food from her home, which she does as well as selling catalogue products.  She does this work in order to earn money to support her family.

Carmen is applying for a loan that she will invest in buying basic staple goods to prepare food.  She hopes that, with this investment, she will be able to improve her finances and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic staple goods for preparing food.

loans.name: Annabel Teresa

texts.es:
La cliente Annabel vive en Guayaquil. Comenzó su negocio de venta de cosméticos cuando una de sus amigas le comenzó que podía vender cosméticos por catalogo y en diferentes horarios. Poco a poco mejoro sus ingresos. También la cliente hace trabajos en casa de limpieza para asi tener mas ingresos. 

Ella tiene muchas aspiraciones de seguir adelante en su negocio por eso quiere trabajar y también asi darle lo mejor a su hijo de 9 años que estudia en una escuela fiscal. Para poder dar una mejor educación ella quiere comprar una computadora y asi su hijo pueda hacer los trabajos que le envían ya que la computadora es una herramienta muy útil para los estudiantes.
texts.en:
Annabel lives in Guayaquil. She started her business of selling cosmetics when one of her friends also started selling cosmetics through catalogs. However, they work on different schedules. Gradually Annabel was able to improve her income. She also takes on housekeeping jobs as a way of earning more money.

Annabel has many aspirations of moving forward with her business, which is why she wants to work. She also wants to provide the best for her nine-year-old child who is studying at a state school. In order to provide a better education, Annabel wants to buy a computer so that her child can do the homework that is assigned. The computer is a very useful tool for students.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her child's schoolwork.

loans.name: Yulicia

texts.es:
Yulicia tiene 54 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la  venta de verduras y frutas como por ejemplo zanahorias, tomates, cebollas, naranjas, papayas, plátanos y piñas. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como piñas y papayas. 
(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Yulicia is 54 years old and lives in the city of Pilcopata.  She is hard-working and enterprising and is moving forward in life.  Yulicia's main work is selling fruits and vegetables such as carrots, tomatoes, onions, oranges, papayas, bananas and pineapples.  She has been a member of the "Chacoq" communal bank for some years and, on this occasion, she needs a loan to buy fruits such as pineapples and papayas.  (The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the Kosñipata district in the Paucartambo province of the department of Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy fruits such as pineapples and papayas.

loans.name: Maria  Teodosa

texts.es: Doña maria de 42 años de edad,  posee una tienda donde vende pan, refrescos, aceites, verduras, frutas, golosinas y también de primera necesidad como: jabón y shampoo entre otras cosas tiene su negocio en su casa de habitación con las ganancias que obtienen de sus ventas logar cubrir algunas necesidades que tiene en su hogar, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Doña maria solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir aún más la tienda de manera que pueda atender mejor a sus clientes y de esta misma forma mejorar sus ventas lo cual es su prioridad para sacar adelante su hogar.
texts.en:
Doña Maria, age 42, has a store where she sells bread, soft drinks, oil, vegetables, fruit, and snack foods. She also offers basic necessities, such as soap and shampoo among other things. Her business is located in her home and the profit she generates from her sales helps to cover some of her household needs.

Maria lives in her own home with husband and three children. She is requesting a loan so that she can restock her store with more items, thereby enabling her to provide better service to her customers. In this manner, she will be able to improve her sales since one of her priorities is to move her household forward.

loans.use: to buy bread, soft drinks, oil, vegetables, fruits, snack foods, soap, and shampoo.

loans.name: Imaculada

texts.en: Imaculada is taking a loan of $1000.00 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store, such as slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta) and biscuits. Imaculada opened her kiosk in 2009 with her own working capital of $400.00. She is a hard working woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta) and biscuits

loans.name: Suzana

texts.en: $1,000.00 is offered to Suzana to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. Suzana will buy some additional supplies such as biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee, and other items for her kiosk. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2008. Suzana feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee, and other items for her store.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy additional stocks of fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Virginia has been in this business for 20 years. She also earns additional income from raising pigs.

Virginia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of fish to sell

loans.name: Uterus Group

texts.en: Mariana is 27 years old and she is married. Mariana is one of the Uterus group (Uterus means hope) and she is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy some additional items such as noodles, sugar, coffee, salt, milk, cigarettes, water, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta and Sagiko. Mariana is applying for this loan to improve her business. Uterus group are happy with this loan because it offers them change for their living conditions in the future.

loans.use: To buy noodles, sugar, coffee, salt, milk, cigarettes, water, Coca-Cola, Sprite, Fanta and Sagiko

loans.name: Neliya

texts.en: Neliya is taking a loan of $600.00 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta), biscuits, and other items. She opened her kiosk in 2005 with her own working capital of $200.00. Neliya is a hardworking woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta), biscuits, and other items

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.en: Apolonia is taking a loan of $1000 to improve her business. She is running a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. She will use the loan to buy stocks to keep in her store such as slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta), and biscuits. Apolonia opened her kiosk in 2011 with her own working capital of $500.00. She is a hardworking woman and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy slippers, cigarettes, soft drinks (Coca-Cola, Sprite, Sagiko and Fanta), and biscuits

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Juliana to improve her business. Juliana has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee and other items. Juliana has been involving herself in business activities since 2010. She feels so comfortable to run her business because she can earn money every day.
Running a business has made Juliana independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, noodles, sugar, coffee and other items

loans.name: Ana

texts.en: Ana has a kiosk to generate income for her family. She has been thinking about how to run a big business but she does not have enough working capital. She felt better when she applied for her first loan and she is applying for her second loan of $1,000. She will buy some additional supplies to keep in her store such as soft drinks, hard drinks, body lotion and biscuits. She is happy with TRM, (Tuba Rai Metin) which offers loans to poor people.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, hard drinks, body lotion and biscuits

loans.name: Lalamak Group

texts.en: Maria is one the Lalamak group (Lalamak means hope). She is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy some additional items to keep in her store, such as gasoline and petrol. Maria is happy with TRM (Tuba Rai Metin), who offer loans to poor people to improve their business for the future. Maria hopes to apply for a bigger loan in the future.

loans.use: To buy gasoline and petrol

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en: Eugenia is taking a loan of $1,000 from TRM (Tuba Rai Metin). She has a shop to generate income for her family. Eugenia has been thinking of how to run a big business but she does not have enough working capital. She felt better when she applied for her first loan. She will buy some additional supplies to keep in her store such as second-hand clothes, shoes and bags. Eugenia is happy with TRM (Tuba Rai Metin) who offer loans to poor people.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes, shoes, and bags

loans.name: Sejaltina

texts.en:
Sejaltina is now applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2001 with her own working capital of $850.  She earns a good income from her business.

She will use her loan to buy some stock to keep in her store such as body lotion, soft drinks, beer, noodles and rice. She is a very hardworking woman and doing business has become her regular activity for the past 11 years. She wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy body lotion, soft drinks, beer, noodles and rice

loans.name: Serafina

texts.en:
Serafina is now applying for a loan of $1000 to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2012 with her own working capital of $200.  She earns a good income from her business.
She will use her loan to buy some stocks to keep in her store such as noodles, cigarettes, and biscuits. Serafina is a very hard working woman and wants to make her business bigger and improve her living conditions in the future.

loans.use: to buy noodles, cigarettes, and biscuits

loans.name: Rhea

texts.en:
Rhea works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business buying and selling vegetables in the Philippines.

Rhea requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

Rhea has been in this business for six years now. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Evelyn successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is re-listing Evelyn's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Sari Karya Group

texts.en:
Ni Ketut is head of the Sari Karya group and all members of the group are getting their seventh loan from MUK. The group still wanted to join the MUK until completely independent. Ni Ketut, after obtaining this loan, purchased three more piglets for fattening. Because the loan size is currently increasing, the other members used it to buy superior piglets and quality feed. 
At the time of the disbursement, all members present and the group obtained referrals from the branch manager about new saving programs, call  SIPURA (Savings For Holiday). All member gave an enthusiastic response and immediately joined the programs. In the picture, Ni Ketut is standing front row left and has raised her hand. Ni Ketut is very grateful to MUK for continuing to provide funding for their businesses.

loans.use: To buy three superior quality piglets for fattening.

loans.name: Muon

texts.en:
Muon, aged 33, is a hard working mother who pursues a fish breeding business and has a position in a market as a fish vendor. She started her businesses in 2011 and everything was going so well. Since it is the main source of income to support her family’s living needs, she loves doing her business very much. She desires to make her business even more profitable.

She is requesting a loan amounting to $600 (US dollars) to buy small fish for breeding and feeds for her to nourish her fish. She hopes the loan will be granted to give her a helping hand in developing her business. With her perseverance, she will achieve all of her dreams especially for her children.

loans.use: to buy small fish for breeding and feed for her to nourish her fish.

loans.name: Roberosa

texts.en:
Roberosa is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a  business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy more seafood to sell to her customers.

Roberosa successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is presenting Roberosa's business profile again for funding of another loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Eufemia works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Eufemia is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase additional fishing equipment for her fishing business.

Eufemia has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing equipment for her business.

loans.name: Panchashakha Group

texts.en: Panchasakha Joint Liability Group was formed in the year 2009 by five women from M. Rampur town in the Kalahandi district of Odisha, India. The purpose was to take a loan from Mahashakti Foundation and expand their businesses. Jyotshnarani is one of the members. The lady standing in front in the photograph with her hand raised is Jyotshnarani. She is 24 years old and lives with her husband and seven-month-old daughter. Jyotshnarani’s husband has been running a multifarious business that includes a photocopy center, stationary store, thread wholesaling and a cloth center for the last 12 years. After marriage, Jyotshnarani has been helping her husband. All these trades are running under one roof. Jyotshnarani gets a monthly income of 7,000 INR from the business. Out of this income, she is barely able to manage her household expenses along with her business expenses. So she wants to expand her business by taking a loan from Mahashakti Foundation. From the present loan, Jyotshnarani wants to purchase more stock of cold drinks, stationary, thread and blouse pieces. This will help her to reduce her purchasing and transportation costs, as she has to replenish her stock frequently. Jyotshnarani hopes to save enough to start a kid’s readymade garment shop and give a better education to her only girl child. The other four members of the group are Laxmi, Ramita, Labanya and Haripriya who are running a fancy store, a book stall, a Tiffin and meals hotel and a photo studio, respectively.

loans.use: To purchase cold drinks, stationary, thread and blouse pieces to sell.

loans.name: Ma'ing

texts.en:
Ma’ing lives with his wife and one grandchild. His children already work and live in Denpasar. He works as a boat driver in one hotel near his house and escorts guests to diving or snorkeling. But his main job is as a salt farmer. He has four plots of salt ponds. 
Ma'ing needs a loan to purchase a water pump to support his business. This machine can make it faster to dry the ponds so he can more quickly produce salt. He hopes through this business that he can improve his family's income because he has a dream to renovate his house and buy more salt ponds.

loans.use: To purchase a water pump machine

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru:
Махбуба женщина 54 лет. Замужем. Мать двоих детей. Дети у неё уже взрослые и у каждого своя семья. Сама Махбуба домохозяйка. Как то Махбуба ходила к своим родственникам в гости и ей посоветовали заниматься скотоводчеством. Это предложение ей очень понравилось. Вот уже 8 лет как занимается откормом и продажей крупно-рогатого и мелко-рогатого скота. Махбуба откармливает КРС у себя дома. В этом деле она имеет большой опыт. Это приносит дополнительный доход к семейному бюджету. Для Махбубы это не только работа но и  удовольствие, когда она ухаживает за животными. В данный момент Махбуба хочет купить КРС для откорма, но для этого у нее  недостаточно денежных  средств и она обратилась в организацию  Арванд. 
На полученный кредит  Махбуба планирует купить скота.  Она  заранее благодарит Арванд  за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Mahbuba is 54 years old and married with two children.  Her children are grown and have families of their own.  Mahbuba is a homemaker, but she was advised by her relatives to get started in raising livestock.  She liked this suggestion very much and she has now been involved in raising and selling sheep and goats for eight years.  Mahbuba also raises cattle at her home and she has a great amount of experience in this area - it brings in some extra money for the family budget.  For Mahbuba, raising animals is not just her work, it is a pleasure.  At the moment, she wants to buy cattle to raise, but she doesn't have enough money for this and she has turned to Arvand.  She plans to buy cattle with her loan.  She thanks Arvand in advance for their help and support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Freda

texts.en:
Freda is 50 years old and married with four children.

Freda is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy medicines and vaccines for her livestock.

She has been raising livestock for six years now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain it.

Freda is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her livestock.

loans.name: Chhan

texts.en:
Chhan is 34 years old, married, and lives with her spouse and two dependent children. She has operated in farming from a small village of the Prey Chor district for many years, whereas her husband has joined to work with a building team in the surrounding areas. With their perseverance and effort, the couple hopes in the future to be able to provide their children with a better quality of life and better financial stability.
 
This will be her second loan. The past loan from HKL has helped her family significantly improve their home. If the loan is granted, she will utilize it to buy a farm animal for the maintenance of her rice fields. She believes that, through her struggle and hardships, she will be able to provide all the needs for the sake of her children especially their education.

loans.use: to buy a farm animal for the maintenance of her rice fields.

loans.name: Jahonoi

texts.ru: Чахоной 38-летняя замужняя женщина. У нее двое дочерей и один сын. Она со своей семьей проживает в Спитаменском районе, в северной части страны. Ее муж занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственной культуры. Сама Чахоной работает продавщицей в аптеке. Сейчас она хотела бы начать новый бизнес. Ее интересует купля-продажа крупнорогатого скота. При дворе ее дома имеется коровник, а также корм для скота. Чахоной запрашивает кредит для закупа двух голов крупнорогатого скота. Продолжительность откорма будет составлять 60-дней, после этого она планирует продать скот на скотном рынке, расположенный недалеко от ее дома. В новой деятельности ей будет помогать семья.
texts.en: Jahonoi is 38 years old and is married with one daughter and one son.  She lives with her family in the Spitamen region in the northern part of the country.  Her husband is involved in raising crops and Jahonoi works as a cashier at a pharmacy, but she wants to start her own business.  She is interested in buying and selling cattle.  She has a cowshed next to her home and feed for the herd.  Jahonoi is asking for a loan to buy two head of cattle.  Her stock of feed will last 60 days, after which she plans to sell the cows at the animal market not far from where she lives.  Her family will help her in this new business.

loans.use: to buy and sell cattle.

loans.name: Gene

texts.en:
Gene is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a pottery business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from her general store. Gene is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

Gene has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба женщина 35 лет. Замужем мать 1 ребёнка. Махбуба из семьи служащих. Мать и отец Махбубы учителя. Махбуба после окончания школы пошла по стопам своих родителей и поступила в педогогический институт в 1994 году. Окончив институт начала свою трудовую деятельность в средней школе в районе Спитамен. Муж Махбубы является мигрантом в РФ. Так как заработная плата в школьных учреждениях были низкие она была вынуждена бросить свою работу и заниматься торговлей. Вот уже более шести лет Махбуба занимается продажей женской обуви на  вещевом рынке района.   Махбуба очень ответственная, добросовестная  женщина с крепкой силой воли.   Для увеличения товарооборота ей необходимы денежные  средства и по этой причине она обратилась в организацию Арванд.  Махбуба хочет расширить свой бизнес  и на полученный кредит хочет закупить новый ассортимент женской обуви.   Махбуба благодарна  МДО "Арванд" за большую поддержку.
texts.en: Mahbuba is 35 years old and she is married with one child.  She comes from a family of civil servants; her parents are teachers and after finishing high school, Mahbuba followed in her parents footsteps and enrolled in the pedagogical institute in 1994.  On graduating from the institute, she started working in a high school in the Spitamen region.  Mahbuba's husband is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  Since the salaries in the school system are very low, she had to quit her profession and start working in a shop.  For more than six years, Mahbuba has been selling women's shoes in a local market.  She is a very responsible and conscientious woman with strong willpower.  She needs money to increase her trade, so she has turned to Arvand for help.  Mahbuba wants to expand her business and she will use this loan to buy a new assortment of women's shoes.  She thanks Arvand for their great support.

loans.use: to purchase of a new range of women's shoes

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to purchase more clothing to sell to her customers.

Helen successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is presenting Helen's business profile for this new loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more French bread in bulk.

loans.name: Gabino

texts.es:
Gabino tiene 64 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la venta de artefactos domésticos como por ejemplo planchas, televisores, radios y otras cosas más. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar artefactos como radios.  

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Gabino, 64, lives in the city of Pilcopata. He is a hardworking and enterprising person; a fighter. His main economic activity is selling home appliances such as irons, TV sets and radios. He has been a member of communal bank “Chacoq” for some years now and this time he is requesting a loan to buy appliances, e.g. radios.

(The city of Pilcopata is the capital city of the Kosñipata district, Paucartambo province, department of Cusco, in Peru).

loans.use: to buy home appliances, e.g. radios.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, bronze, copper, cans, bottles, and other items.

loans.name: Herminia Doris

texts.es:
Doris tiene 44 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la  venta de madera. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 
(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: Doris is 44 years old and lives in the city of Pilcopata. She is hard-working and enterprising and is moving forward in life. Doris's main source of income is selling wood. She has been a member of the "Chacoq" communal bank for some years and, on this occasion, she needs a loan to buy wood. (The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the Kosñipata district in the Paucartambo province of the department of Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Heide

texts.en:
Heide is married and she works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Heide has been in this business for four years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Heide aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is married and she works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines and earns additional income from hog raising and tricycle transport. Irene is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her vegetables.

Irene has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides .

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 38 años, esta casada y tiene 4 hijos, tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su familia.El trabajo de Sonia consiste en la venta de comida rápida. Ha destinado la parte delantera de su casa para acondicionar un pequeño restaurante en donde ofrece diariamente platillos como salchipapas, salchipollos, pollos broaster y otros productos que complementa con gaseosas o refrescos de frutas frescas. Se inició en este negocio hace tan solo 5 meses y desde entonces se siente muy motivada y con muchas ganas de continuar con su trabajo.Le gusta su trabajo porque lo realiza en la comodidad de su hogar y eso le permite sentirse segura aunque no le agrada las constantes lluvias que se presentan en esta temporada lo cual daña las calles impidiendo el paso continuo de la clientela que necesita. Sin embargo, sabe que esta estación es temporal por lo cual continúa trabajando con las mismas ganas con la que inició su labor .En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio.Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes como arroz, pollo, papas, salchichas, frutas para refresco, condimentos y aceite para que continúe trabajando.
texts.en: Thrity-eight-year-old Sonia is married and has four children.  She has her own house, where she lives alongside her family.  Sonia makes a living selling fast-food.  The front part of her house is set up as a small restaurant where every day she offers dishes such as hot dogs, chicken hot dogs, broasted chicken and other dishes served with fizzy drinks or fresh fruit juices.  Sonia start the business just five months ago and she is feeling very motivated and really wants to continue with this work.  She enjoys her work because she can do it from the comfort of own home.  There she feels safe though she does not like the constant rains that the season have brought and which are damaging the paths on which her much-needed customers arrive.  However, she knows the season will come to an end and so Sonia continues her work with enthusiasm.  On this occasion, Sonia is applying for 500 Nuevo Soles and she is very happy to know that she will have financial support as it will make her feel safer as she progresses with her business.  With the loan, Sonia will buy ingredients such as rice, chicken, potatoes, sausages, fruit making juices, condiments and oil so as to continue working.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, chicken, potatoes and more.

loans.name: Maria Adelina

texts.es: DOÑA MARIA ADELINA DE 41 AÑOS DE EDAD ORIGINARIA DE SAN MARTIN Y DESDE HACE YA MAS DE 19 AÑOS SE DEDICA JUNTO A SU ESPOSO A LA VENTA DE ARTICULOS DE USOS DOMESTICOS COMO PONCHOS, DELANTALES, PERRAJES, FAJAS Y VAJILLAS DE PELTRE. ELLA HA SIDO RESPONSABLE EN SU CREDITO Y SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA SURTIR MAS SU NEGOCIO,PARA LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS DE USOS DOMESTICOS Y ASI OFRECER UN MEJOR SERVICIO A SUS CLIENTES.
texts.en: Maria Adelina is 41 years old and is from San Martin. For over 19 years, she and her husband have worked selling clothing and furnishings such as ponchos, aprons, shawls, underwear and pewter tableware. She is a responsible borrower, and is requesting a loan to buy more stock for her business, such as clothing and furnishings and in this way offer a better service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing and furnishings.

loans.name: Jonalyn

texts.en:
Jonalyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase more rice to sell to her customers.

Jonalyn successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is listing Jonalyn's business profile for her new loan in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more rice to sell

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 40 years old and married with four children.

Josephine works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Josephine has been in this business for six years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Josephine aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell .

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business selling home products in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to purchase additional home products to sell.

Lorena successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is listing Lorena's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional home products to sell.

loans.name: Neftali

texts.es: DON NEFTALI ES ORIGINARIO DE SAN MARTIN JILOTEPEQUE Y DESDE HACE YA MAS DE 11 AÑOS SE HA DEDICADO A LA VENTA DE COMIDA, SU NEGOCIO ES MUY RECONOCIDA EN LA LOCALIDAD POR EL SABOR DE SUS COMIDAS. JUNTO A SU ESPOSA LUCHAN Y SE ESFUERZAN A DIARIO PARA AGRADAR EL PALADAR DE  SUS CLIENTES. ELLOS COCINAN COMIDAS TIPICAS DEL LUGAR Y TAMBIEN LES HACEN PEDIDOS ESPECIALES. HA MOSTRADO MUCHA RESPONSABILIDAD EN SUS PAGO, INCLUSO HA DEPOSITADO ANTES DE LA FECHA. EL SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE LEÑA, MAIZ AGUAS Y GASEOSAS Y MATERIALES Y CONDIMENTOS PARA COCINAR PARA LA ELABORACION DE COMIDAS.
texts.en:
Don Neftali is originally from San Martin Jilotepeque and has been selling food for more than 11 years. His business is well-known in his town because of the flavor of his dishes. He and his wife strive each day to please the palates of their customers. They prepare traditional local foods, but they also fulfill special requests.

Neftali has demonstrated great responsibility with his payments, sometimes submitting them before the due date. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy firewood, corn, water, sodas, condiments, and cooking supplies for preparing his dishes.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, water, sodas, condiments, and cooking supplies.

loans.name: Garden

texts.es: Garden, de 21 años de edad,es soltero y no tiene hijos, vive en compañía de sus hermanos en la casa de sus padres.El trabajo de Garden consiste básicamente en brindar servicio de elaboración de planos, asesoramiento logístico, ejecución de proyectos y otros. Su trabajo es independiente y en horarios libres dependiendo de la disponibilidad de los clientes.  Gracias a los años que ha venido estudiando ha aprendido todo lo necesario para cumplir muy bien con su trabajo. Tiene en su casa una computadora en donde trabaja arduamente cuando tiene algún contrato, ahí puede pasar muchas horas concentrado en brindar un buen resultado para sus clientes. Afortunadamente, asegura que los clientes con los que ha trabajado hasta ahora se han sentido satisfechos con su función. Lleva en esta actividad 2 años y se siente muy bien haciendo lo que mas le gusta aunque al principio le fue complicado abrirse camino en este rubro ya que su corta edad generaba ciertas dudas del desempeño de su labor, sin embargo su tenacidad y esmero le permitieron seguir adelante, ahora espera seguir progresando con su trabajo.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 300 soles y se siente contento con el apoyo financiero que le están brindando para seguir adelante.Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales de oficina que usa en su trabajo tales como papel bond A4, discos, y tinta de computadora.
texts.en:
Garden is 21 years old, single and has no children. He lives with his siblings in his parent's home. Garden's work mainly involves producing plans, providing logistics advice, implementing projects and other jobs. He is am self-employed and works flexible hours depending on his client's availability. Thanks to the years he has spent studying, he has learned everything he needs to do a good job. 

He has a computer in his home, on which he works hard when he has a contract. He may spend many hours concentrating in order to provide his clients with a good result. Fortunately, he says that the customers with whom he has worked until now have been satisfied with his work. He has worked in this business for two years and is really happy to be doing what he most enjoys, although at the beginning it was difficult for him to get started down this path because his young age meant that some people doubted how hard he would work. However, his tenacity and effort enabled him to succeed, and now he hopes to keep progressing in his work. 

On this occasion, he is requesting a loan of 300 soles and is grateful for the financial support he is receiving to move forwards. He will use the loan he has requested to buy office supplies such as A4 paper, discs and ink for his computer.

loans.use: to buy office supplies such as computer paper, discs and ink.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.es: Samuel tiene 59 años de edad, está casado con Amelia de 55 años de edad, vive en una casa alquilada,acompañado de uno de sus hijos.Samuel es un hombre muy trabajador, toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, desde muy temprano se dirige a sus chacras junto a su hijo a cuidar sus animales y sus sembríos de maíz, como una actividad complementaria para obtener otros ingresos pero él junto a su esposa decidierón poner un negocio dedicado a la venta de productos comestibles, siendo su casa su propio centro de trabajo.Se iniciaron en esta actividad, cuando uno de sus hijos decide estudiar en la ciudad de Tarapoto, y al ver que no le alcanzaba el dinero, deciden poner el negocio de abarrotes y venta de maíz al por mayor buscando obtener otros ingresos para poder pagar los estudios de su hijo.Este es el primer crédito de Kiva, y esta muy agradecido por el apoyo económico recibido y promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Con el monto solicitado de S/.2000.00 comprará productos comestibles tales como arroz , azúcar, leche , entre otros .
texts.en:
Samuel is 59 years old and married to Amelia, age 55. They live in a rented house with one of their children. Samuel is a hardworking man who has spent his entire life in the agricultural trade. He and his son head toward their fields in the early morning hours to care for their animals and look after their corn crops. In order to complement his farming activities, Samuel and his wife decided to open a business of selling food products as a way earning additional income. The store is located in their home. They started this business when one of their children decided to study in the city of Tarapoto. Since they did not have enough money, Samuel and his wife decided to open a grocery business and begin selling corn in bulk so that they could have additional income to pay for their son’s studies.

This is Samuel’s first loan with Kiva and he is very grateful for the financial support he has received. Therefore, he promises to be punctual with his loan payments. The amount of 2,000 PEN that he requested will be used to buy food products such as rice, sugar, milk, and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and other items.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth is 40 years old and married with 8 children.
Lilibeth works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.
Lilibeth has been working in general stores for nine years and has previously received funds through Kiva.
Lilibeth aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Usaha Ternak Group

texts.en: In order to further enhance earnings in the field of breeding pigs, Wayan and the whole group of Usaha Ternak have requested another loan from MUK for the same amount. They are very satisfied with the services provided, so they agreed to develop their business. Wayan already has two 12-month-old pigs and 5 piglets. She will use the loan to buy super quality feed. Wayan still hopes for assistance from MUK in regards to business consulting. Her profits will be saved for future needs.

loans.use: to buy super quality feed.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en: Melba is now borrowing PHP 14,000 to fund her fish vending business, which was previously funded through Kiva's partner, NWTF. The business continues to provide Melba and her family with income that is improving their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Ma. Mae

texts.en:
Ma. Mae is 26 years old and married with 3 children.
Ma. Mae works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.
Ma. Mae has been in this business for 10 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.
Ma. Mae aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Milvia

texts.es: Milvia, de 26 años de edad, es madre soltera pero tiene 2 pequeñas hijas a quienes brinda todo su amor. Vive junto a ellas en la casa de su madre luchando por salir adelante.La actividad que realiza Milvia es la venta de comidas típicas de la región como “juanes” (arroz envuelto en hojas), “patarashca” (pescado envuelto en hoja) “tacacho” y otros platillos que son muy consumidos en su ciudad. Su trabajo actualmente se inicia desde muy temprano en un local que alquila en una zona comercial muy concurrida por el público. Anteriormente vendía en el frontis de su vivienda, pero gracias a la demanda que tienen sus potajes decidió establecer un pequeño restaurante e ir tras el camino del progreso. Realiza esta labor desde hace 2 años con ayuda de su hermana.Le gusta su actividad porque gracias a ello puede generar el dinero necesario para apoyar a su madre con los gastos del hogar .En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, está muy contenta al saber que tiene un respaldo económico para seguir avanzando con sus metas.Con el monto solicitado comprará progresivamente los ingredientes necesarios que usa para la preparación de sus comidas como arroz, plátanos, menestras, carnes y pescados.
texts.en:
Milvia, 26, is a single mother of two daughters, to whom she gives all her love. She lives with them in her mother’s house and she struggles to get ahead. Milvia sells traditional foods, such as “juanes” (rice wrapped in leaves), “patarashca” (fish wrapped in leaves), “tacacho” and other preparations that are popular in her city. She starts working very early in an establishment she rents in a popular commercial area. She used to work in the front porch of her house, but given the high demand her preparations have, she decided to open a small restaurant and follow the road to success.

Milvia has had this business for two years and her sister helps her. She likes her job, because she can generate the income she needs to help her mother with the home expenses. This time she is requesting 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN]. She feels happy knowing that she has the financial support she needs to continue pursuing her goals. With the requested amount she will buy, little by little, all the ingredients she needs to prepare her food, such as rice, plantain, legumes, meat and fish.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, plantain and legumes.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Doña Alicia es originaria del municipio  Tecpan Guatemala, tiene 50 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus 9 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la siembra de tomate y a la producción de hongos chinos.
Desde hace algunos años ella viene realizando esta actividad porque es el medio que ha ayudado para salir adelante.
El esposo de ella trabaja como profesor y  gracias al apoyo de el y de toda su familia a podido salir  adelante con su negocio.
El sueño de ella es ampliar mas su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias  y asi mandar a sus hijos a la escuela para un futuro mejor, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de semillas de hongos y compra de semillas de verduras para el cultivo.
texts.en:
Alicia is from the town of Tecpan, Guatemala. She is 50 years old and is raising 9 children. She grows tomatoes and Chinese mushrooms. She has been doing this activity for several years, because it is the way she has gotten ahead. Her husband works as a teacher and thanks to his support and that of the whole family, she has been able to get ahead with her business.   

Her dream is to expand her business more to make better profits and thus send her children to school for a better future. She is asking for this loan to buy mushroom and vegetable seeds to grow.

loans.use: to buy seeds for farming.

loans.name: Marfe

texts.en:
Marfe is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pottery business in the Philippines.
She is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy materials needed for her pottery business.
Marfe successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.
NWTF is re-listing Marfe's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose lives in the Nkubu region of Eastern Kenya. This region is known for its high production and it is located near the slopes of Mount Kenya. Rose is married and has four children, all of whom go to school.

She has practiced farming for nine years. Her source of income comes from farming and producing milk, tea leaves, maize, avocados and vegetables as well as operating a hotel business.

Rose wants to purchase a water tank for her farm, so she has requested a loan of KES 30,000 from Juhudi Kilimo. This loan will help her to improve her children's quality of education. She intends to purchase at least an acre of land for irrigation. The major challenge she faces is poor weather conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank for her farm.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly works hard to support her family. She has a general store business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from raising hogs. 

Nelly is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Nelly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sport bicycles and spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Johanna Beatriz

texts.es: Johanna de 30 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, etc.  vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia,  con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos, johanna  desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicita un credito que le permita poder comprar todo lo necesario como: perfumes, esmaltes para uñas, desodorantes para damas y caballeros, cremas para manos  y cuerpo, etc. ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podrá obtener mejores ganancias y así seguirá dándole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Johanna is 30 years old and sells all types of personal use products such as lotions, deodorants, perfumes, and other items as a street vendor in different neighborhoods that are near her home. With the profit she generates from her sales and the assistance of her husband, she is able to pay for household expenses. She lives in her own house with her husband and their four children.

Johanna wants to increase her business, so she is requesting a loan in order to buy everything she needs such as perfumes, nail polishes, deodorants for women and men, hand and body crèmes, and other products. She already has many customers, so she will be able to offer these products at affordable prices. With the assistance she requested, Johanna will be able to generate more income and provide what her family needs without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, nail polishes, deodorants for women and men, hand and body crèmes, and other products.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is married and works hard to support her family. She has a pottery business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from clothing sales. Susan is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy materials needed for her pottery.

Susan has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more alcohol to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to restock her restaurant by buying food and drinks to sell.

loans.name: Nellina

texts.es:
Nellina, de 59 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijas ya adultas. Habita cómodamente su propia casa en compañía de  su esposo y una de sus hijas.La actividad que tiene Nellina es la venta de bebidas gasificadas de diferentes marcas y sabores. Los productos que ofrece a sus clientes los adquiere al contando y son vendidos en su casa a sus vecinos y transeúntes quienes son sus clientes habituales. Tiene más de 10 años dedicándose a este negocio y hasta el momento solo cuenta con el apoyo ocasional de su hija,  quien atiende a los clientes cuando ella esta fuera de casa. Considera a su negocio rentable por la rapidez con la que se acaban sus productos. Le agrada realizar su trabajo pues puede manejar su tiempo libre para realizar algunas actividades del hogar, además se siente feliz por los ingresos económicos que percibe a diario con los cuales puede apoyar a su esposo a pagar los gastos de su hogar.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas.
El monto solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de bebidas gasificadas de diversas marcas para surtir su local de atención.
texts.en: Nellina is 59 years old. She is married and has 4 grown daughters. She lives comfortably in the home she owns with her husband and one of her daughters. Nellina's activity is selling different brands and flavors of sodas. She pays for the products she offers her customers up front and sells them from her house to neighbors and others who are her regular customers. She has been doing this for more than 10 years and so far has the help of just one daughter on occasion, who tends to the customers when she isn't home. She considers this business to be profitable because of how quickly she runs out of the products. She likes to do her job because she can manage her free time to do household tasks. She is also happy with the income that she gets daily with which she can help her husband pay for the household expenses. At this time, she is asking for S/. 1000. She is very happy to know she will have financial support, since this way she feels she can advance her business. On the other hand, she is committed to making her payments on time. The amount she has asked for is to buy different brands of sodas to stock her locale.

loans.use: to buy sodas.

loans.name: Saul

texts.es:
Saul tiene 41 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de reparación de automóviles y motocicletas, el tiene un taller donde repara y esta implementado básicamente con herramientas y maquinas.
Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como pistones, lubricantes, aceites y otras cosas más.  

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Saul is 41 years old. He lives in the city of Pilcopata and is a hardworking and  enterprising person who is getting ahead. His main financial activity is repairing cars and motorcycles. He has a workshop where he does his repairs and it is outfitted with basic tools and machinery. 

For several years, he has belonged to the “Chacoq” communal bank and at this time he needs the loan to buy work materials such as pistons, lubricants, oils and more.  

(The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the district of Kosñipata in the province of Paucartambo, department of Cuzco, Perú).

loans.use: to buy work materials such as pistons, lubricants, oils and more.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es: Veronica de 43 años de edad, habita en la linda e histórica ciudad Cartagena de Indias, ubicada a orillas del mar Caribe. Ella es comerciante desde hace 6 años, cuando por necesidad de generar ingresos, decidió emprender su pequeña aventura de negocios que desde ese tiempo le ha dado buenos resultados. En un principio tenia pocos clientes, pero poco apoco fue ganando el mercado de artículos desechables, como vasos, platos, pocillos, tenedores, cucharas etc.  Hoy cuenta con un local  y sus principales clientes son    restaurantes, vecinos del barrio y transeúntes, a quienes les vende contad, mientras Verónica realiza sus compras a crédito.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará envases para postres y dulcería y recipientes especiales  para fiestas y eventos.  Su meta mas adelante es incrementar sus ventas en un 20% y a nivel personal  se prepara para el próximo año tener un hijo. Mientras esto curre auguramos éxito en su inversión de Kiva, fundamentado en su experiencia, disciplina  y capacidad de trabajo.
texts.en: Verónica is 43 years old old and lives in the beautiful, historic city of Cartagena de Indias on the shores of the Caribbean Sea.  She has been a businesswoman for six years, having started her own little business venture because she needed an income.  Verónica has had good results.  In the beginning she had very few customers but, little by little, she started to gain ground on the market for disposable cutlery and crockery, such as cups, plates, bowls, forks and spoons.  Now Verónica has her own premises and her main customers are restaurants, neighbours and passers-by.  Customers pay cash but Verónica makes her purchases on credit.  She is currently applying for a Kiva Loan - her first with the "Fundación Mario Santo Domingo - which she will use to buy packaging for cakes and others sweet things, and special containers for parties and events.  Verónica's future goal is to increase her sales by 20% and, on a more personal level, she is getting ready for the birth of her child next year.  We expect Verónica to be successful with her Kiva investment as she is experienced, disciplined and has the capabilities to do this work.

loans.use: to buy packaging for cakes and others sweet things, and special containers for parties and events

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 58 years old, married and has 6 children, one of whom is in school. 

Lorna is in the agricultural business, raising pigs, in the Philippines. Lorna requested a PHP 22000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lorna has been raising pigs for 12 years now and has borrowed 20 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future Lorna would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a married woman with 4 children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She sells children's clothes and has a side income as a teacher. She hopes to educate her children up to the university level and own a boutique despite the seasonal challenges of her business and low salary. Grace intends to use the loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Naga Tegal Wangi Group

texts.en: Ni Made has 2 sows who will soon give birth. She used the loan to purchase feed only. She plans to sell the piglets after raising them for 2 months. She hopes the sows can give birth safely and no piglets will die. She will save the profit from the sale of the piglets to support her children's school needs.

loans.use: to purchase feed only.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, de 39 años de edad , esta casada y tiene un hijo de 18 años, ella vive a lado de su familia en su casa propia.El trabajo que realiza Gloria es la venta de materiales de construcción como alambres, enchufes, clavos, lijas, tubos, accesorios, entre otros, para cumplir este rol tiene un espacio acondicionado en su hogar ,lleva en está actividad un promedio de 10 años, este tiempo le ha servido para hacerse conocida en su sector, siendo su pequeña tienda una de las más concurridas de su barrio. Realiza este trabajo con la ayuda de su padre. Trabaja todo el día y sus ganancias al culminar su jornada son muy alentadoras. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite solventar los gastos que se generan en su hogar y le ha permitido  seguir pagando los estudios de su hijo quien es su principal inspiración para seguir trabajando. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000 y está muy contenta de tener un apoyo financiero que le permite continuar con su trabajo .Con el monto solicitado comprará mercadería para su ferretería principalmente comprará tubos de conexión para agua y desagüe.
texts.en: Gloria is 39 years old, married and has an 18 year old son.  She lives alongside her family in her own house.  Gloria makes a living selling building materials such as cables, plugs, nails, sandpaper, pipes, accessories and more.  For this work, Gloria has a space set up in her home.  She has now been doing this work for around ten years and she has become well-known in the area with her small store becoming one of the busiest in the barrio.  Gloria does this work with help from her father.  She works all day and, by the end of each day, she has made very encouraging earnings.  What she likes about her work is that it allows her to cover her household costs and that has allowed her to continue paying for her son's education - he is her main reason for working.  On this occasion Gloria is applying for 1000 Nuevo Soles and she is very happy to have financial support that will allow her to continue with her work.  Gloria will use the loan to buy merchandise for her hardware store.  She will mainly buy  connecting tubes for water and waste pipes with the loan.

loans.use: to buy water and waste pipes and more.

loans.name: Nieves

texts.es:
Nieves, de 42 años,es madre soltera de 2 hijos, tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado sus hijos, a quienes atiende y brinda todas las comodidades necesarias para seguir adelante.El negocio que tiene Nieves es la venta de comidas regionales por las noches como anticuchos, pollo asado, chorizos y otros. También prepara distintos menús como guisos y caldos de gallina cuya venta lo realiza por las tardes de lunes a viernes. Instala su puesto de ventas en la esquina de su barrio. Atiende muy amablemente a sus clientes y esta actitud sumada a su buena sazón le ha permitido obtener muy buena acogida y demanda. Trabaja sola y realiza este negocio desde hace 1 mes.Le gusta su negocio pues comenta que le gusta cocinar gracias a las enseñanzas que su madre le brindó, del mismo modo también le agrada el ingreso económico que obtiene por sus ventas los cuales le han permitido pagar sus cuentas y ayudar a solventar los gastos básicos de su hogar. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 300 soles y está muy contenta por el apoyo financiero que le brindan para que pueda seguir adelante con su trabajo. 
Con el monto solicitado comprará todos los ingredientes que usa en la preparación de sus platillos como carnes, plátanos, aceite, condimentos, arroz, tubérculos, verduras, fideos y otros.
texts.en:
Nieves is 42 years old. She is a single mother of 2 children. She has her own home where she lives with her children.  She looks after them and provides for their everyday needs so that they can get ahead in life.

Nieves runs a business selling food at night time. She sells regional dishes such as anticuchos (grilled meat skewers), roast chicken, chorizos, etc. She also prepares meals, like stews and chicken soups, which she sells in the afternoon Monday to Friday. She sets up her stall on a street corner in her neighbourhood. 
 
She has a friendly attitude with her customers. This, coupled with her cooking skills, has led to the high demand for her food and customer loyalty. She works alone. She has been running the business for 1 month. She likes it, saying that she likes cooking thanks to the instruction she received from her mother. She is happy with the income she is earning from her sales, which has enabled her to pay her bills and to help pay for the household’s basic requirements.

She is using this opportunity to request a loan of 300 soles. She is very grateful for your financial support that helps her to continue with her work.
With the money requesting she will buy the ingredients she uses to prepare her dishes, that is meat, plantains, cooking oil, condiments, rice,  tubers, vegetables, pasta, and so on.

Con el monto solicitado comprará todos los ingredientes que usa en la preparación de sus platillos como carnes, plátanos, aceite, condimentos, arroz, tubérculos, verduras, fideos y otros.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, meat, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
Cirila tiene 46 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es brindar servicio de hospedaje. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento del hospedaje o sea va comprar  toallas y jaboncillos.  

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Cirila is 46 years old and lives in the city of Pilcopata. She is hard-working and enterprising and is moving forward in life. Cirila's main source of income comes from the hotel that she runs. She has been a member of the "Chacoq" communal bank for some years and, on this occasion, she needs a loan to maintain the hotel and to buy towels and soaps.

(The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the Kosñipata district in the Paucartambo province of the department of Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy towels and soaps.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel tiene 39 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de Pilcopata, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que sale adelante. Su actividad económica principal es la fabricación de muebles de madera como por ejemplo roperos, sillas, mesas, puertas y otras cosas más,  él tiene un taller donde elaborar sus muebles y está implementado básicamente con herramientas y algunas maquinas. Desde hace varios años que pertenece al banco comunal “Chacoq” y en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como madera, clavos, cola de carpintero y otras cosas más.  

(La ciudad de Pilcopata es la capital del distrito de Kosñipata dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo dentro del departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Daniel is 39 years old and lives in the city of Pilcopata. He is hard-working and enterprising and is moving forward in life. Daniel's main source of income comes from making pieces of furniture from wood.  He produces wardrobes, chairs and tables, among other things, and has a simple workshop, equipped with tools and some machines, for making the furniture.  Daniel has been a member of the "Chacoq" communal bank for some years and, on this occasion, he needs a loan to buy to buy materials for work, such as wood, nails, glue and more. 

(The city of Pilcopata is the capital of the Kosñipata district in the Paucartambo province of the department of Cusco, Peru).

loans.use: to buy materials for work, such as wood, nails, glue and more.

loans.name: Digna Mercedes

texts.es:
Digna es una mujer de 33 años de edad joven y madre de 5 hijos los cuales dependen de ella y su pareja en todos los aspectos ya que solo ellos viven en su casa de hogar. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria completa la cual pudo cursar hasta gracias al esfuerzo y empeño de parte de sus padres para que ella pudiese tener un conocimiento básico; pero no pudo seguir por la falta de apoyo económico. Ella tiene mucha experiencia en el trabajo de la agricultura ya que lo practican hace 20 años en las actividades de la siembra de plátano, café, banano, frijoles, maíz, etc. Sus clientes son los diferentes compradores que llegan a la zona, vecinos y amigos que conocen la calidad de su producto. Los terrenos que ella y su pareja cultivan son propios gracias al trabajo y la dedicación por muchos años los cuales están ubicados a 500 metros de la casa de habitación al cual se traslada a pie.

Hoy en día ella solicita ayuda para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos ya que con este apoyo podrá proteger sus cultivos de café ya que de esa forma estará más seguro de plagas entre otros.

Su sueños es mejorar día a día sus cultivos poder incrementar un poco más sus cosechas en variedad y calidad, como también las mejoras a su casa de habitación; pero su prioridad sus hijos ya que el esfuerzo es por ellos y para ellos para cubrir sus estudios y otras necesidades que diariamente se presentan para el mejoramiento de su familia.
texts.en:
Digna is a young woman of 33.  She lives with her partner and is the mother of five children who are still dependent.  The family live in their own home.  Digna completed her primary education thanks to the efforts and determination of her parents who wanted her to have a basic education.  However, she was not able to continue her education as her family did not have enough money.
